data.text: @TheGoodPreside1 I will never stop wearing my masks. This lax behavior is guaranteed to make the virus surge.

@EatSleepMask Ugh Thank Goodness! Remember to keep wearing your mask. The booster doesn’t protect you 100%. In fact it might not work At all! But, continue getting them weekly …you are doing your part to save society!
@TheGoodPreside1 I get weekly boosters. Who do you think I am?
@EatSleepMask You mean you did not get your booster????? 😳
@TheGoodPreside1 I still have one good arm thankfully. I have not yet gained feeling back in my vaccine arm, but I know it is much better than having COVID.
@EatSleepMask I just hope I still have my arms.. I will need to hold both of my masks tight against my face.
@TheGoodPreside1 You are so smart. I actually changed my comment as I came to the same realization as well.
@EatSleepMask Probably not… It will probably cause a new variant.

@TheGoodPreside1 I would take the time to first mask myself and then my family members in the case of a nuclear fall out. Then if six feet social distancing were not possible, someone is going outside.
@EatSleepMask At least they are still following the science if there is a nuclear explosion. https://t.co/uSkPG2Qxfs
